body_html:
Thanks @michaelem! I'm not too familiar with Devise (in fact, I don't like it at all because of all the hidden magic). Where is new_user_session_path defined? It's not a named route helper known to rake routes.

I don't think this error is triggered for unconfirmed users only. It seems to appear when the GH authentication fails for whatever reason. Sadly, that is hard to reproduce locally 😞

body:
Thanks @michaelem! I'm not too familiar with Devise (in fact, I don't like it at all because of all the hidden magic). Where is `new_user_session_path` defined? It's not a named route helper known to `rake routes`.

I don't think this error is triggered for unconfirmed users only. It seems to appear when the GH authentication fails for whatever reason. Sadly, that is hard to reproduce locally 😞
